data.Title: Microsoft Services Restored After Global Outage
data.Description: Microsoft experienced a massive outage on May 23, 2024, disrupting services like Bing, Copilot, ChatGPT, and even DuckDuckGo. The outage lasted over 24 hours, impacting users worldwide. Microsoft acknowledged the issue and worked to restore services, but the cause remains undisclosed.

data.Title: Google AI Overviews Draw Criticism for Inaccurate and Harmful Information
data.Description: Google's new AI Overviews feature is facing backlash for providing inaccurate, nonsensical, and potentially harmful information. Critics highlight issues with YMYL (Your Money or Your Life) queries and question the adequacy of testing. Google is under pressure to address these concerns and improve the feature's reliability.

data.Title: Google Search Updates Spark Concerns Among Businesses
data.Description: Airlines, hotels, and retailers are expressing concerns over recent Google Search algorithm changes. They fear these updates could lead to a decline in direct sales as Google increasingly prioritizes its own travel and shopping services in search results.

data.Title: Google Search Console Reports Fewer Links, Raising Concerns Among SEOs
data.Description: SEOs are reporting a significant decrease in the number of links displayed in Google Search Console reports. The discrepancy, observed over the past month, has sparked concerns about potential data accuracy issues within the platform. Google is investigating the matter.

data.Title: Google Search Expands Indexing Capabilities to Include EPUB Files
data.Description: Google Search can now index Electronic Publication (.epub) files, expanding its reach and accessibility to a wider range of digital content. This update allows users to discover and access ebooks and other publications in EPUB format directly through Google Search.
